Wow!  Lots of quick responses.  Some quick replies:


Julien - I have indee=
d seen the contest and I've thought of 
entering.  The big issues is that y=
ou get a graphic file of the 
screen, so I would need to extract details fr=
om the graphic, or let 
NEAT find features.  While that would be very cool =
if it worked, I 
would be amazed if it could work from first principles but=
 would 
rather require a hearty set of primitives.  They mention the 
possi=
ble availability of an API to extract features, but I have yet 
to see it c=
ome to life.

Ken - May I call you Ken?? -  Once I have a SourceForge proje=
ct up 
and running, I'll post back here and let people know.  Mat Bucland 
=
has given me permission to post his code along with it, so it should 
be a =
complete package.

-Kirk
